trends: There have been 116 other sightings in Dallas
There were no other sightings in Dallas on or around January 13th 2008
divs: sighting detailsi had an interesting and slightly unbelivable experience at my place of business at about noon yesterday sunday. the skies were completely clear and i was working on one of my inventory cars checking out a part i had purchased for it. also i will add that i had been working or started out at 4 am earlier running my repo\collections route and had gotten to my lot at about 9am so i had been there a good two hours when i looked up at the sky and sure enough i see a cruising formation of what seemed like "orbs " traveling southwest in a linear formation i counted about eight or nine of them then, here is where it gets freaky, they then formed a sort of stationary position as in an octagon form then i kid you not, would blink in and out of sight then one of them broke formation and headed southeast the others hovered then one by one blinked out of sight. i told my brother he said i was losing it well, then he calls me and tells me about the reported sightings in stehpenville tx . and even expresses his surprise and slight fear of the reality possibility of this phenomenon.in my depth perception to the skies the objects could be clearly seen with the naked eye but i really could not tell you how large or small they were. the looked like metallic steel balls with a shiny white hue to them who knows maybe they were large but way up in the stratosphere and hauling ass. but to my eyes they seemed like floating and crusing metallic orbs at birds altitude. i wanted to confirm in my mind that they were just birds but the image and birds and planes also in the sky did not support my mental hypothosis by the way if it had not been for the cnn mentioning this website i would not have known about this website to report this.
